document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Radiant Dragon''''' by [[Elaine Cunningham]] is book four in the [[Cloakmaster Cycle]], a six-book series for the [[Spelljammer: AD&D Adventures in Space|Spelljammer]] campaign setting. It takes place in [[Realmspace]]—including the planet [[Garden]] and the island of [[Evermeet]]—and [[Winterspace]].

{{Quote|[[Teldin Moore]] is looking for the great ship [[Spelljammer (spelljammer)|''Spelljammer'']]. A [[radiant dragon]] holds the key to commanding the great ship but needs Teldin's help to take control. Meanwhile, the [[elves]] seek his assistance in the [[second Unhuman War]], where a group of elf-hating monsters trades with [[goblinoid]]s for a secret weapon against the [[elven Imperial Fleet]]. But someone in Teldin's inner circle is pulling all parties toward battle.}}
document_data.Synopsis: Teldin Moore has stopped on [[Garden]] in [[Realmspace]] to resupply. While at a tavern, a bar fight erupts. Teldin escapes the chaos and finds himself in the company of an [[aperusa]] man and two young [[dracon]]s.
